room_title: Escape room "The Wizard’s Keep" by Trapped in Buffalo
review: Would give them zero stars if I could. There was no one at the store for our confirmed booking (paid for through Groupon). On top of that they haven’t even responded to my email I sent them after their no show.

room_title: Escape room "The Wizard’s Keep" by Trapped in Buffalo
review: We did the Wizard's Keep room and it was a ton of fun. If you're a Harry Potter fan, you will greatly appreciate the design of the room. Or even if you aren't, it's still worth it. The puzzles were challenging and clever. I think we finished in about 32 minutes. We will definitely be back to try the other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "The Wizard’s Keep" by Trapped in Buffalo
review: While I'm not the best at escape rooms, I've been a Harry Potter fan for more than 15 years now. The Wizard's Keep was just magical. It's like the Wizarding World of Harry Potter, you just don't have to buy a ticket to Orlando! The puzzles weren't too difficult or varied but still fun and exciting. Great for Harry Potter fans! And our game master was just lovely. Great energy from her and she let me feel comfortable to fangirl.

room_title: Escape room "The Wizard’s Keep" by Trapped in Buffalo
review: There are many escape rooms to choose from in Buffalo, NY but we chose Trapped for the Harry Pottery theme room-Wizarding World (the only one currently in Buffalo). It was a birthday party celebration for my daughter. Sean and Robin were very accommodating and gave us A+ service.

room_title: Escape room "The Wizard’s Keep" by Trapped in Buffalo
review: We absolutely loved the experience of "Trapped" and can't recommend it enough.What a great time

room_title: Escape room "The Wizard’s Keep" by Trapped in Buffalo
review: So much fun! I highly recommend trying this with a group of friends. You won't be disappointed!! Will definitely be back to try another room!
